text: Thomas Wylie (born 10 November 1907, date of death unknown) was a Scottish professional footballer who played as a forward for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1907 births Category:Year of death missing Category:Footballers from Renfrewshire Category:Scottish footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Benburb F.C. players Category:Motherwell F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Queen of the South F.C. players Category:Peebles Rovers F.C. players Category:Scottish Football League players Category:English Football League players
title: Tom Wylie (footballer, born 1907)
